name: Cosmic Intruder
description:
Two player asymmetric  shmup where one plays as the alien waves and the other the human fighter sent to destroy their homeworld!

CONTROLS:

Human FighterController 1KeyboardMoveStick/DpadArrow KeysShootXSpaceDodgeALeftAltFire MissileBM Alien ArmadaController 2KeyboardMouseSelect Enemy TypeUp/Down on Stick/Dpad OR ABXYW and S OR 1234 keysClick on icons on the leftCycle through spawn pointsRight/Left on Stick/DpadA and DMove mouse over main screenSend waveTriggersFLeft Click

Music is Amama by Pink Project, 1982.
